Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
Class containing all Controllers of all games currently being played and all ServerUpdateViewInterfaces. It uses the Singleton Pattern. Some public methods take the lock on this.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Lobby getInstance()
      Getter for the instance of Lobby. If no instance exists, it creates a new one.
      Returns:
      The instance of the lobby, either already existing or newly created.

    • removeConnection

      public void removeConnection(String nickname)
      Unsubscribes a client from updates sent by this. It synchronizes on this.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player to remove.

    • login

      public void login(String nickname, ServerUpdateViewInterface view)
      Processes a login request from a ServerUpdateViewInterface and registers that view. It synchronizes on this.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname chosen by the ServerUpdateViewInterface.
      view - The ServerUpdateViewInterface performing the request.

    • createGame

      public void createGame(int numberPlayers, int numberCommonGoals, ServerUpdateViewInterface view, String nickname)
      Creates a new Controller with the parameters requested and logs the ServerUpdateViewInterface that performed the request into the newly created game. Moreover, all clients that have not joined in a match yet are notified of the creation of the match. It synchronizes on this.
      Parameters:
      numberPlayers - The number of players in the game to create.
      numberCommonGoals - The number of common goal cards in the game to create.
      view - The view of the client creating a new game.
      nickname - The nickname that performed the request.

    • selectGame

      public void selectGame(int id, ServerUpdateViewInterface view, String nickname)
      Joins the ServerUpdateViewInterface that performed the request in the selected match (by id).
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the selected game.
      view - The view of the client selecting a game.
      nickname - The nickname of the client that performed the request.

    • bind

      public void bind(List<String> nicknames, int id)
      Binds the nicknames of some players to the id of a game. In this way, the Lobby knows, in case of a reconnection, to which game the players should be reconnected to. It synchronizes internally and on this separately: with the lock on this, no sensitive lock is acquired.
      Parameters:
      nicknames - List of the nicknames of the players to bind.
      id - The id of the game the players are getting bound to.

    • unbind

      public void unbind(List<String> nicknames, int id)
      Unbinds the nicknames of some players to the id of a game. It synchronizes internally and on this separately: with the lock on this, no sensitive lock is acquired.
      Parameters:
      nicknames - list of the nicknames of the players to unbind.
      id - The id of the game the players are unbinding from.

    • setNull

      public static void setNull()
      This method sets the Singleton instance to null, allowing us to instance it again, used only for testing.
